page.title: 03ST.ANDREWS CHURCH.
page.content: St.Andrews Church is{95 years}old.It is made of{stone}and has a{belfry}with {a bell}that rings before services.The church has{arched}stained glass windows and an{arched}door in a porch. It can seat{300}people but it is not always full.There are 10 people in the choir.The vicar gives{6 services}a week.On Sundays I put my best clothes on to go to church.I get there for a quarter past 9.I sing the first hymn in church and then I go down to{Sunday {School}with the rest of the children.I have been to weddings and christenings at church.On Thursdays I go to {Brownies}in the church hall.We play games,sing,go to places and make things.I have{badges}for swimming, horse riding,artist,hostess,collectors house orderly and my musicians badge. {By Yvonne Harvey and Leonie Hall.
